Room.Name: Main Courtyard West
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the west side of the courtyard near the castle garden.
Room.LongDescription: Directly east you can see a wonderful garden surrounded by a small fence. There are fruit and nut trees of every description, and rows of interesting plants. A white mist rises on the far side, so it is impossible to see how big the garden is. To the south you can see the southern wall of the castle, and to the east is a great expanse of flagstone with a small fountain and pool forming a rest area.
